translation: Those who have no faith in this Dharma, O Parantapa, return to the path of this world without attaining Me.
commentary: 9.3 Unbelievers without faith? Men men? of duty of religion? of this of this? Parantapa O scorcher of foes? unattainable without attaining? Mam Me? nivartante return? mrityusansaravartmani in the path of this world of death.Commentary Arjuna asks? O Lord? why do people not attempt to attain this knowledge of the Self when it can be easily attained? when it is the highest of all things? and when it gives the
